A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I’m honestly a bit surprised to see how much negative kickback that this film has gotten from the fanbase. Was the movie perfect? Absolutely not. There were definitely things that I had problems with\, but I feel like the positives far outweigh the negatives. This was a really fun film that did a lot of really interesting things with the Star Wars universe\, even if it was a bit messy at times.
